5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from ‘Imran bin Husain that he asked the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) about a man who prays sitting down. He said, “Whoever performs prayer standing up, that is better. Whoever performs prayer sitting down will have half the reward of one who prays standing. And whoever performs prayer lying down will have half the reward of one who prays sitting.”

chapter.ara-name: باب صَلاَةِ الْقَاعِدِ عَلَى النِّصْفِ مِنْ صَلاَةِ الْقَائِمِ
chapter.eng-name: The prayer of the one who sits is equivalent to half of the Prayer of one who stands
